Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each shadow quality level.

textureSizeScaler.Wiki: The resolution scaler to apply to shadow maps.

textureSizeDivider.Wiki: The resolution divisor to apply to shadow maps.

textureMinSize.Wiki: The minimum resolution for a shadow map.

textureMaxSize.Wiki: The maximum resolution for a shadow map.

blurCountBias.Wiki: The shadow map blur count bias to apply (set count bias, unchanged at 0).
